sentence: The latest tally of analyst opinions from the major brokerage houses shows that among the 30 stocks making up the Dow Jones Industrial Average, Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is the #22 analyst pick.
Within the broader S&P 500, when components were ranked in terms of analyst favorites, PG claims the #369 spot.
Looking at the stock price movement year to date, Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is lower by about 18.8%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
